languages.text: {n}Эльдарка едва заметно вздрагивает. Она открывает было рот, потом отворачивается, обдумывая слова.{/n} "Мои слова не залечат ран и не вернут павших. Как и не восстановят твой протекторат. Однако..."

{n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка едва заметно вздрагивает. Она открывает было рот, потом отворачивается, обдумывая слова.{/n} "Мои слова не залечат ран и не вернут павших. Как и не восстановят твой протекторат. Однако..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari shrugs, barely visible. She opens her mouth at first, then turns away, looking for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore tour protectorate. However..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的身躯以你几乎无法察觉的幅度微微颤抖。她张开嘴，之后转过了头，似乎在寻找恰当的词汇。{/n}“我的话语无法治愈伤口，无法使亡魂死而复生，也无法让王朝的废墟恢复如初。但是……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的身躯以你几乎无法察觉的幅度微微颤抖。她张开嘴，之后转过了头，似乎在寻找恰当的词汇。{/n}“我的话语无法治愈伤口，无法使亡魂死而复生，也无法让王朝的废墟恢复如初。但是……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se estremece, tan sutilmente que casi no te das cuenta. Abre la boca, pero luego aparta la mirada, buscando las palabras adecuadas.{/n} «Nada de lo que diga sanará las heridas ni devolverá la vida a los caídos. Como tampoco restaurará tu protectorado. Sin embargo...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se estremece, tan sutilmente que casi no te das cuenta. Abre la boca, pero luego aparta la mirada, buscando las palabras adecuadas.{/n} «Nada de lo que diga sanará las heridas ni devolverá la vida a los caídos. Como tampoco restaurará tu protectorado. Sin embargo...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet tressaille presque imperceptiblement. Elle ouvre la bouche puis se détourne, cherchant ses mots.{/n} « Mes paroles ne soigneront pas les blessures et ne rendront pas la vie à ceux qui sont tombés. Elles ne reconstruiront pas votre protectorat. Cependant... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet tressaille presque imperceptiblement. Elle ouvre la bouche puis se détourne, cherchant ses mots.{/n} « Mes paroles ne soigneront pas les blessures et ne rendront pas la vie à ceux qui sont tombés. Elles ne reconstruiront pas votre protectorat. Cependant... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet zittert so minimal, dass es dir fast entgeht. Sie öffnet den Mund und wendet sich dann ab, auf der Suche nach den richtigen Worten.{/n} "Meine Worte heilen keine Wunden, bringen die Gefallenen nicht zurück. Und sie werden Euer Protektorat nicht wiederherstellen. Allerdings ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet zittert so minimal, dass es dir fast entgeht. Sie öffnet den Mund und wendet sich dann ab, auf der Suche nach den richtigen Worten.{/n} "Meine Worte heilen keine Wunden, bringen die Gefallenen nicht zurück. Und sie werden Euer Protektorat nicht wiederherstellen. Allerdings ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは微かに身を震わせる。彼女は口を開いたもののすぐに背を向け、適切な言葉を探す。{/n}「我の言葉は、傷を癒すことも、倒れた者を呼び戻すこともできない。そして、お前の保護領を建て直すこともできない。だが…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは微かに身を震わせる。彼女は口を開いたもののすぐに背を向け、適切な言葉を探す。{/n}「我の言葉は、傷を癒すことも、倒れた者を呼び戻すこともできない。そして、お前の保護領を建て直すこともできない。だが…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, neredeyse fark edemeyeceğin şekilde ürperiyor. Ağzını açıp doğru kelimeleri ararken arkasını dönüyor.{/n} "Sözlerim, yaraları iyileştirmeyecek ya da kaybedilenleri geri döndürmeyecek. Protektoranı da iyileştirmeyecekler. Ama..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders, so slightly that you almost miss it. She opens her mouth, then turns away, searching for the right words.{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds nor bring back the fallen. And they will not restore your protectorate. However..."
